Platonic Skeletons



The regular dodecahedron and icosohedron, in the hollow-faced style depicted by da Vinci.
Taken Wednesday, August 11, 2010, 08:53:32AM. Original image size: 3888x2592, 2.4Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/13s@ F5.6, ISO 1250, 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS, 33mm (52mm equiv)
PS CS4 3600:20, Exp0.5 Sat10, USM 20:100
